thread.title: This Adorable Pup Was Scheduled for Euthanasia Until a Rescue Saved Him
thread.title_full: This Adorable Pup Was Scheduled for Euthanasia Until a Rescue Saved Him

title: This Adorable Pup Was Scheduled for Euthanasia Until a Rescue Saved Him
text: Mar 5, 2017 Finally, some good news. Hello Giggles brings our attention to Picasso, the sweetest ever dog who was born with a crazy looking face and a heart of gold and I want him! A post shared by Luvable Dog Rescue (@luvabledogrescue) on Mar 1, 2017 at 10:18am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Picasso was dumped at an Oregon shelter by a breeder. He was then slated for euthanasia when Luvable Dog , a rescue group, stepped in to save the little dude and his brother, Pablo. Most Popular Just look at that face. LOOK AT IT: A post shared by Luvable Dog Rescue (@luvabledogrescue) on Feb 28, 2017 at 9:31pm PST Since Picasso went viral, Luvable Dog has been inundated with adoption requests. One lucky person is gonna take Picasso (and Pablo!) homeâ€”but all those other people should head to their nearest shelter and adopt their own Picasso! Follow Laura on Twitter .
